divs: Sighting DetailsI was out fishing and was watching some clouds and saw what I thought was a jet contrail but I noticed that this thing was moving faster than any aircraft I have ever seen. I am 65 years old and retired from the USAF and have seen the SR-71 flying and this thing was much faster. The altitude was very high, I could see any object nor was the any sonic boom. It was travelling in a southeasterly direction and finally disappeared over the horizon.
Summary: Something very fast across the sky
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Clarkston
There were no other sightings in Clarkston on or around September 3rd 2009
